706676f-a.text:
165-173 Scholes Street, north side, east from Graham Ave. Also seeu is 202-204 Graham Ave., east side, at the N.E. corner of Scholes Street.
In the foreground, is the Graham Ave., Trolley Line.
October 25, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.

706675f-a.text:
Scholes Street, at the N.W. corner of Graham Ave. Also shown, is Nos. 202-204 Grahaw Ave., (right), at the N.E. corner of Scholes Street.

706674f-a.text:
Scholes Street, south side, between Graham and Manhattan Aves., as seen across the clearing at the N.Wi. corner of Graham Ave., and Scholes Street. In the background (left), are the Spires of the Most Holy Trinity Church
(R.C.).
March 31, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.

Graham Ave., east side, south from Scholes Street. Also seen is Scholes Street, south side, east of Graham Ave. The women in costume,
